<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_security_acl"><sys_security_acl action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><admin_overrides>true</admin_overrides><advanced>true</advanced><condition/><description>Default access control on x_1383184_charityb_bids</description><local_or_existing>Local</local_or_existing><name>x_1383184_charityb_bids</name><operation display_value="create">create</operation><script><![CDATA[// Check if the current user has a profile in the User Profile table

var userProfileGR = new GlideRecord('x_1383184_charityb_user_profile');
userProfileGR.addQuery('name', gs.getUserID()); // Assuming 'user' is a reference field to the user table
userProfileGR.query();

// If the user profile exists, grant access
if (userProfileGR.next()) {
    answer = true;
} else {
    // Otherwise, deny access
    gs.addErrorMessage('You must create a user profile before you can bid');
    answer = false;
}]]></script><security_attribute/><sys_class_name>sys_security_acl</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>christy</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-05-07 04:45:07</sys_created_on><sys_id>abbf528593c6421094e3f15a7bba1036</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>x_1383184_charityb_bids</sys_name><sys_package display_value="CharityBids" source="x_1383184_charityb">bcaeeadb9369421094e3f15a7bba1090</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="CharityBids">bcaeeadb9369421094e3f15a7bba1090</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_security_acl_abbf528593c6421094e3f15a7bba1036</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>lalitha</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-05-22 06:50:21</sys_updated_on><type display_value="record">record</type></sys_security_acl></record_update>
